QuestData.Title: Back from the Dead
QuestData.Description: <Olothil sighs.>$b$bMy sister tries my patience sometimes.$b$bNo matter. I've identified a few locations that our parents might be. I shall search in this area with Kallistia. You've already helped us so much... would you help us look to the east?$b$bYou can use my scrying orb to see the locations that our ritual has uncovered.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Scrying Orb to determine potential locations of night elf spirits, then go rescue them.
QuestData.RewardText: After over ten thousand years... to see mother and father again...$b$b<The elven mage is at a loss for words.>$b$bThank you, $n. Thank you.
